date3.description: Enter cultivar change date (na if not in use)

simulation.name: 350ppm
simulation.memo:
Climate Change in APSIM Simulations
To perform a simple simulation to quantify the effects of climate change on production system simply drag a climate change object from the standard toolbow onto the simulation at the same level as your met file. The climate change user interface will allow you to enter simple modifiers (either additive or multiplicative) for maximum and minimum temperature, solar radiation and rainfall.

script.text:
! Adjust daily temperatures, rainfall and radiation up or down according to user-defined amounts ! To apply different levels of climate control to different times of year add multiple copies of this logic into your simulation and change the window.
if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then maxt = maxt + [MaxtChange] mint = mint + [MintChange] rain = rain + rain * [RainChange] / 100 radn = radn + radn * [RadnChange] / 100 co2 = [CO2] endif
co2 = [CO2] tav = tav + ([MaxtChange] + [MintChange]) / 2

start_date.description: Enter the start date of the simulation

end_date.description: Enter the end date of the simulation

esw_amount.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

crop.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], crop_class = [class] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif
nextcrop = 0 fallowin = 0

modulename.description: On which module should the event come from :

eventname.description: On which event should fertiliser be applied :

fertmodule.description: Module used to apply the fertiliser :

fert_amount_sow.description: Amount of starter fertiliser at sowing (kg/ha) :

fert_type_sow.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea, nh4so4_n, rock_p, banded_p, broadcast_p

script.text: [fertmodule] apply amount = [fert_amount_sow] (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type_sow]

crop.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

script.text: if [crop].StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

manager.name: Reset water, nitrogen and surfaceOM on fixed date

category.description: When should a reset be done

surfaceommodule.description: Name of your surface organic matter module :

script.text: if (today = date('[reset_date]')) then resetWater = '[resetWater]' resetNitrogen = '[resetNitrogen]' resetSurfaceOM = '[resetSurfaceOM]' if (resetWater = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Water' reset endif if (resetNitrogen = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Nitrogen' reset endif if (resetSurfaceOM = 'yes') then '[surfaceommodule]' reset endif act_mods reseting endif

simulation.name: 600ppm
simulation.memo:
Climate Change in APSIM Simulations
To perform a simple simulation to quantify the effects of climate change on production system simply drag a climate change object from the standard toolbow onto the simulation at the same level as your met file. The climate change user interface will allow you to enter simple modifiers (either additive or multiplicative) for maximum and minimum temperature, solar radiation and rainfall.

script.text:
! Adjust daily temperatures, rainfall and radiation up or down according to user-defined amounts ! To apply different levels of climate control to different times of year add multiple copies of this logic into your simulation and change the window.
if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then maxt = maxt + [MaxtChange] mint = mint + [MintChange] rain = rain + rain * [RainChange] / 100 radn = radn + radn * [RadnChange] / 100 co2 = [CO2] endif
co2 = [CO2] tav = tav + ([MaxtChange] + [MintChange]) / 2

start_date.description: Enter the start date of the simulation

end_date.description: Enter the end date of the simulation

esw_amount.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

crop.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], crop_class = [class] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif
nextcrop = 0 fallowin = 0

YieldAccumulator

tracker.variable: sum of rain on end_of_day from transition to now as TRainfall
sum of SEp on end_of_day from transition to now as TEp
sum of drain on end_of_day from transition to now as Tdrainage
sum of runoff on end_of_day from transition to now as Trunoff
sum of es on end_of_day from transition to now as Tes
sum of fertiliser on end_of_day from transition to now as applied_fert
count of clock.simulation_days on end_of_day from transition to now as days_in_stage

Soil.name: Heavy Clay
Soil.DataSource: YP. A Peake-CSIRO Sustainable Ecosystems, Toowoomba
Soil.Comments: Generic soil developed by Allan Peake.

script.text: NextCropIndex = 1 NextCrop = ' ' ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' SummerFallowIn = 'no' WinterFallowIn = 'no' FallowIn = 'no'

if (ChooseNextCrop = 'yes') then if (NextCropIndex = 1) then NextCrop = '[crop1]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 2) then NextCrop = '[crop2]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 3) then NextCrop = '[crop3]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 4) then NextCrop = '[crop4]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 5) then NextCrop = '[crop5]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 6) then NextCrop = '[crop6]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 7) then NextCrop = '[crop7]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 8) then NextCrop = '[crop8]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 9) then NextCrop = '[crop9]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 10) then NextCrop = '[crop10]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 11) then NextCrop = '[crop11]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 12) then NextCrop = '[crop12]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 13) then NextCrop = '[crop13]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 14) then NextCrop = '[crop14]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 15) then NextCrop = '[crop15]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 16) then NextCrop = '[crop16]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 17) then NextCrop = '[crop17]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 18) then NextCrop = '[crop18]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 19) then NextCrop = '[crop19]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 20) then NextCrop = '[crop20]' endif if (NextCrop = 'nil' or NextCrop = ' ') then NextCrop = '[crop1]' NextCropIndex = 1 endif NextCropIndex = NextCropIndex + 1 ChooseNextCrop = 'no' endif ! if the next crop is due to be a fallow and we're within the ! correct date range then put a fallow in. if (NextCrop = '[WinterFallowName]') then if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn = 'no') then if (date_within('[SummerFallowEndDate], [WinterFallowEndDate]') then WinterFallowIn = 'yes' FallowIn = 'yes' ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif elseif (NextCrop = '[SummerFallowName]') then if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn = 'no') then if (date_within('[WinterFallowEndDate], [SummerFallowEndDate]') then SummerFallowIn = 'yes' FallowIn = 'yes' ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif
! if we currently have a fallow in and we're at the end of the fallow window ! then remove the fallow. if (WinterFallowIn = 'yes' and today = date('[WinterFallowEndDate]')+1) then WinterFallowIn = 'no' FallowIn = 'no' endif if (SummerFallowIn = 'yes' and today = date('[SummerFallowEndDate]')+1) then SummerFallowIn = 'no' FallowIn = 'no' endif

esw_amount.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

crop.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], crop_class = [class] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

esw_amount.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

crop.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], skip = [skiprow] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], crop_class = [class] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

crop.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

script.text: if [crop].StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

crop.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

script.text: if [crop].StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

fert_type_sow.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea, nh4so4_n, rock_p, banded_p, broadcast_p

script.text: [fertmodule] apply amount = [fert_amount_sow] (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type_sow]

esw_amount.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

crop.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], crop_class = [class] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

start_date.description: Enter the start date of the simulation

end_date.description: Enter the end date of the simulation

esw_amount.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

crop.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], skip = [skiprow] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif
nextcrop = 0 fallowin = 0
WetYield = yield / (1 - [MoistureContent]/100)

manager.name: Simple gross margin (put before harvesting rule)

script.text:
! Reset the bank to zero the day after harvest. if (ResetBank = 1) then Bank = 0 ResetBank = 0 endif
! Subtract fertiliser cost from the bank if (fertiliser > 0)then Bank = Bank - ([NCost] * fertiliser + [NApplicationCost]) endif
! Add harvest return to the bank if StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or plant_status = 'dead' then FullPrice = [Price] + (grain_protein - [MinimumProtein]) * 2 * [ProteinIncrement] Bank = Bank + FullPrice * (WetYield / 1000) ResetBank = 1 endif

crop.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

script.name: end_of_day
script.text: if [crop].StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

nextcrop = 0 fallowin = 0
WetYield = yield / (1 - [MoistureContent]/100)

manager.name: Simple gross margin (put before harvesting rule)

script.text:
! Reset the bank to zero the day after harvest. if (ResetBank = 1) then Bank = 0 ResetBank = 0 endif
! Subtract fertiliser cost from the bank if (fertiliser > 0)then Bank = Bank - ([NCost] * fertiliser + [NApplicationCost]) endif
! Add harvest return to the bank if StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or plant_status = 'dead' then FullPrice = [Price] + (grain_protein - [MinimumProtein]) * 2 * [ProteinIncrement] Bank = Bank + FullPrice * (WetYield / 1000) ResetBank = 1 endif

script.text: if [crop].StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

script.name: start_of_day
script.text: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], crop_class = [class] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

script.name: init
script.text: nextcrop = 0 fallowin = 0

modulename.description: On which module should the event come from :

eventname.description: On which event should fertiliser be applied :

script.name: [modulename].[eventname]
script.text: [fertmodule] apply amount = [fert_amount_sow] (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type_sow]

crop.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

script.text: if [crop].StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

manager2.name: Irrigate on date

category.description: Irrigation will be applied on the date(s) below

sameDays.description: Apply Irrigation on the same day(s) each year? (yes/no) - if "no" then must include the year of application below

irrigDatesStr.description: Dates for one or more Irrigation applications (dd-mmm or dd-mmm-yyyy) as a list with a space between dates

asw_depth.description: Depth to which ASW is calculated. (mm)

crit_fr_asw.description: Fraction of ASW below which irrigation is applied (0-1.0)
